#summary Provides a new CodeProvider to remove a block of code, whilst leaving the code within it intact.
[http://www.rorybecker.co.uk/DevExpress/Plugins/Community/CR_RemoveOuterBlock/ http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Download.png]      [http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/InstallInstructions  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/InstallHelp.png]
[http://code.google.com/p/dxcorecommunityplugins/wiki/Feedback  http://dxcorecommunityplugins.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/Common/Graphics/Feedback.png]
===== Requires DXCore 11.1 =====
=== Introduction ===
This plugin provides a CodeProvider "Remove Outer Block" which will remove a block of code and replace it with it's own contents.
=== Usage ===
Position your caret on any of these blocks and choose the "Remove Outer Block" option from the Code menu .
